title: Tikka
content: Tikka is one of the most popular food and snacks spots of IIT Kharagpur. Due to its central location and nearness to the lecture halls in Vikramshila and main building, it enjoys a persistent crowd of people during its operation. Its open seating arena is a casual hangout location.
Facility of coupons is the most popular among NCC students . as they are provided with coupons in every events or classes they have of lot of benefits from Tikka .
